com.aionemu.gameserver.model.geometry
Interface Area

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractArea, CylinderArea, PolyArea, RectangleArea
public interface Area

Basic interface for all areas in AionEmu.
It should be implemented in different ways for performance reasons.
For instance, we don't need complex math for squares or circles, but we need it for more complex polygons.

Author:
SoulKeeper

getDistance2D

double getDistance2D(java.awt.Point point)
Returns distance from point to closest point of this area ignoring z.
Returns 0 if point is inside area.

Returns:
distance or 0 if is inside area

getClosestPoint

java.awt.Point getClosestPoint(java.awt.Point point)
Returns closest point of area to given point.
Returns point with coords = point arg if is inside

Parameters:
point - point to check
Returns:
closest point

getClosestPoint

java.awt.Point getClosestPoint(int x,
                               int y)
Returns closest point of area to given coords.
Returns point with coords x and y if coords are inside

Parameters:
x - x coord
y - y coord
Returns:
closest point

getClosestPoint

Point3D getClosestPoint(Point3D point)
Returns closest point of area to given point.
Works exactly like getClosestPoint(int, int) if isInsideZ(int) returns true.
In other case closest z edge is set as z coord.

Parameters:
point - point to check
Returns:
closest point of area to point

getClosestPoint

Point3D getClosestPoint(int x,
                        int y,
                        int z)
Returns closest point of area to given coords.
Works exactly like getClosestPoint(int, int) if isInsideZ(int) returns true.
In other case closest z edge is set as z coord.

Parameters:
x - x coord
y - y coord
z - z coord
Returns:
closest point of area to point
